entry.title: WIND WARNING , Ingonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 100 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
